name: Danger block runner
description:
Make your way through the factory without getting crushed, sawed into pieces och getting hitted by spikes,
Get as far as possible to collect as many points as possible in order to be the best basically.

You can play the game for hours and there is no in app purchases or ads, just 100% pure fun game!

One touch controll, simply tap the screen in order to jump,
Time your jumps in order to stay alive!
